data.title: resume linardakiparisot
data.meta_description: resume linardakiparisot - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text: 1. Exhibitions, public projects : 2015: Salon de Montrouge, Paris, France 2014: Barrier Beautification - mural painting , Jackson Heights, Queens, New York City - DOT In the mouth of the wolf. Die Wolf, Die!, Embassy of the Republic of Cyprus - Cultural Centre, Athens, Greece. Access to Art Bronx Art Space, NYC - August 2-16, 2014. International Bio-urbanism Workshop - Kalokerinos Foundation, Heraklion Greece Connecting communities after the Crisis : Asbury Park, NJ No respect, Onassis cultural centre, Athens. Mesogios video season, Heraklion. (head curator and co-founder of contemporary art space Mesogios) 2013: Invisible city, public space project with architects union, Heraklion. The Mediterranean experience, Macedonian museum of contemporary art Thessaloniki Biennale. Tribute to Cavafy, Xania. P_Public, public space mural painting at city stadium, Xania. The sleeping beauty project, public space project, Heraklion. Metalages, Mesogios, Heraklion. 2012: The sleeping beauty project, series of public space murals, Heraklion. Akasaka, Atheati poli/unseen city, European School murals and workshops . Imagine the city, Saint Marc Basilica, Heraklion. 2010: In the backyard of kings, action field Kodra 10, Thessaloniki. (curator) 2009: Hinterland, action field Kodra, Thessaloniki. 2008: Live my life Monrovia, City Hall, Liberia, visual arts workshop and public space interventions, installation of wheelchair ramps and exhibition about accessibility and mobility issues. Topoi, Macedonian museum of contemporary art, Greece. Clips, festival Traverse video, Goethe institut, Toulouse, France. Quoi de neuf, Saint Louis Cloisters, Avignon, France. 2007: Fish and ships, Kunsthaus Hamburg, Germany. Clips, Kunstverein Tiergarten, Galerie Nord, Berlin. 2006: Der Jungbrunnen, Kunstverein Harburger Bahnhof, Hamburg, Germany. Curious Little Sister Wants More, Museum Boijmans Van Beuningen, Rotterdam, The Netherlands. Remonter les saumons, Grands bains douches de la Plaine Gallery, Marseille, France. Die Nacht / La Nuit , Arte TV Show #48. Up & Down, National Gallery Tirana, Albania. Fresco & Salty 2, Kunsthalle Margari, Thessaloniki and Torino, Italy. 2006: Theirland, a not unnatural enterprise, Kodra action field 06, Thessaloniki. 2004: 15 years, Château de Servières, Marseille. 2003: In Between, Fri-Art Fribourg Kunsthalle, Switzerland. 11th biennale of young artists of Europe and Mediterranean, Athens. Residencies 2005-06: Künstler zu gast in Harburg, Senat / City of Hamburg. 2001-05: City of Marseille, artist’s studios. 1999: Domaine de Kerguehennec, contemporary art center, sculpture parc, Brittany, France. Publishings 2014: No Respect, Onassis Foundation for arts and letters / 2008: Day after Day, Fri-Art, Kunsthalle Fribourg. 2004: Ecology of fluids, Analogues editing house for contemporary art. 2003: Art Press #292 juillet-aout 2003. Education 2000: Fine arts school, Marseille. National higher diploma of visual arts with honors 1999: Hochschule der Künste, Berlin. 1998-1995: Fine arts school, Beaux-arts de Quimper, National diploma of fine arts. - Limerick Institut of Technology and Fine Arts College. Eirini Linardaki - Vincent Parisot esperos@gmail.com www.linardaki-parisot.com/ c/o Butchko, apt 5F 430 Lafayette street, New York 10003 NY
